net.dean.jraw.models

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.models.JsonModel
      • net.dean.jraw.models.RedditObject
        • net.dean.jraw.models.Thing
          • net.dean.jraw.models.Contribution
            • net.dean.jraw.models.PublicContribution
              • net.dean.jraw.models.Comment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Created, Distinguishable, Gildable, JsonAttribute, Votable

    @Model(kind=COMMENT)
public class Comment
extends PublicContribution
    Represents a comment on a link

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getApprovedBy()
      Gets who approved this comment, nor null if the logged in user is not a moderator
      java.lang.String getAuthor()
      Gets the name of the account that posted this comment
      Flair getAuthorFlair()
      Gets the author's flair.
      java.lang.String getBannedBy()
      Who removed this comment, or null if you are not a mod
      java.lang.String getBody()
      Gets the body of the comment
      java.util.Date getEditedDate()
      The edit date in UTC, or null if it has not been edited.
      java.lang.String getParentId()
      The ID of the comment or submission this comment is replying to

      Gets the comments made in reply to this one

      The amount of times this comment has been reported
      java.lang.String getSubmissionAuthor()
      Gets the author of the parent link
      java.lang.String getSubmissionId()
      Gets the ID of the submission this comment is located in
      java.lang.String getSubmissionTitle()
      The title of the parent link, or null if this comment is not being displayed outside of its own thread
      java.lang.String getSubredditId()
      The ID of the subreddit in which this comment was posted in
      java.lang.String getSubredditName()
      The subreddit the comment was posted in, excluding the "/r/" prefix (ex: "pics")
      java.lang.String getUrl()
      The author of the parent submission
      java.lang.Boolean hasBeenEdited()
      Checks if the comment has been edited.
      java.lang.Boolean isControversial()
      If the comment is controversial (has a large number of both upvotes and downvotes)
      java.lang.Boolean isSaved()
      True if this post is saved by the logged in user, otherwise false
      java.lang.Boolean isScoreHidden()
      Whether the comment's score is currently hidden

      • getEditedDate

        @JsonProperty(nullable=true)
public java.util.Date getEditedDate()
        The edit date in UTC, or null if it has not been edited. Note that the Reddit API will return a boolean value for some old edited comments, in which this method will return null. If this comment was retrieved via the inbox, this will also return null.
        Returns:
        The edit date in UTC, or null if it has not been edited
